(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Hash 
          (Pair 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (String))) 
            (Symbol)) 
          (Pair 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Integer "2"))) 
            (Symbol)) 
          (Pair 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Lhs 
                  (True "true")))) 
            (Symbol)))))))
